product_overview: A simple web app to track job applications: add, view, filter, update status, and delete application records. The UI is Next.js frontend with server actions and Prisma-backed persistence.
core_goals: Provide a clear dashboard showing all job applications and key details.
Allow users to add and edit application records with validation.
Enable quick filtering and searching by company, title, or status.
Support safe deletion of application records with confirmation and error handling.

features.name: Dashboard / Application List
features.description: Main dashboard that lists all job applications in a responsive grid showing company, title, status, location, salary, and application date.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Redirected to /applications -> See list of applications displayed in a responsive grid showing Company Name, Job Title, Status, Location, Salary Range, and Application Date
Navigate to /applications -> See empty state when no applications exist -> Click "Add Application" button to start creating the first application
Navigate to /applications -> See list of multiple applications -> Click an application card (or row) -> See application details or edit form open

features.name: Add / Edit Application
features.description: Create or update a job application via a form. Required fields: Company Name, Job Title, Status, Location, Application Date. Optional fields: Salary Range, Notes. Inputs validated by Zod and persisted via server actions.
user_flows: Navigate to /applications -> Click "Add Application" button -> Fill job details in the form (Company, Title, Status, Location, Application Date) -> Fill optional fields Salary Range and Notes -> Submit the form to create or update -> See success message -> See new application appear in the list

Navigate to /applications -> Click "Add Application" button -> Fill job details leaving Company Name blank -> Submit the form to create or update -> See validation error indicating Company Name is required -> Fill Company Name -> Submit the form to create or update -> See new application in the list
Navigate to /applications -> Click an existing application -> Edit fields in the form -> Submit the form to create or update -> See success message -> See updated details in the list

Navigate to /applications -> Click "Add Application" button -> Fill valid form -> Submit the form to create or update -> Server returns error -> See server error message/toast -> Form remains open for retry

features.name: Application Filtering
features.description: Search and filter the list by company name or job title and by application status (APPLIED, INTERVIEWING, OFFER, REJECTED) to narrow the displayed applications.
user_flows: Navigate to /applications -> View list of applications -> Enter "Acme" in search bar -> See list filtered to applications with Company Name or Job Title matching "Acme" -> Clear search -> See full list

Navigate to /applications -> View list of applications -> Click status filter dropdown -> Select "INTERVIEWING" -> See list filtered to applications with status INTERVIEWING -> Clear filter -> See full list
Navigate to /applications -> Enter search term "NonexistentCo" in search bar -> See 'No results' message or empty state for the filtered list -> Clear search -> See full list

features.name: Delete Application
features.description: Remove applications from the tracker using an in-list delete action with a confirmation step and server-side deletion via server actions.
user_flows: Navigate to /applications -> View list of applications -> Click Delete button on an application in the list -> Confirm deletion in confirmation dialog -> See success message -> See application removed from the list
Navigate to /applications -> View list of applications -> Click Delete button on an application in the list -> Cancel the confirmation dialog -> See application remain in the list
Navigate to /applications -> Click Delete on an application -> Confirm deletion -> Server returns error on delete -> See server error message/toast -> Application remains in the list

features.name: Job Application Management
features.description: Create, read, update, and delete job applications
user_interactions: Fill job details in the form (Company, Title, Status, Location)
Submit the form to create or update
Filter applications by status or name
Delete an application via the list
